mapper.select: SELECT /*sb.repository.mapper.RPD1000_DefaultMapper.S001*/ TR_DT /*거래일자*/ , ACNO /*계좌번호*/ , TR_NO /*거래번호*/ , SYNS_CD /*적요코드*/ , TR_TP_DCD /*거래유형구분코드*/ , TR_AMT /*거래금액*/ , BF_DACA /*이전예수금*/ , AF_DACA /*이후예수금*/ , CNCL_YN /*취소여부*/ , STRT_TR_NO /*시작거래번호*/ , ORGN_TR_NO /*원거래번호*/ , CLNT_NM /*의뢰인명*/ , REAL_TR_DTM /*실제거래일시*/ , OPRT_TR_DTM /*조작거래일시*/ FROM SB.RPD1000 /*거래내역*/ WHERE TR_DT = '${TR_DT}' AND ACNO = '${ACNO}' AND TR_NO = '${TR_NO}'
